     * @param {T} t
     * @template T
     */
    function Zet(t) {
        /** @type {T} */
        this.u
        ~~~~

    /**
     * @param {T} v
               ~

     * @param {object} o
     * @param {T} o.nested
               ~

    Zet.prototype.add = function(v, o) {
        this.u = v || o.nested
        return this.u
    }
    var z = new Zet(1)

    z.u = false
    /** @type {number} */

     * @typedef {Object} A
     * @property {T} value
